# Restless Quickstart (Termux)

## Run
```sh
./restless --help
./restless tui
```

## Connect & Discover (domain only)
```sh
./restless discover bankid.no
./restless discover openai.com
```

## Request Builder (manual)
```sh
./restless request --method GET --url https://example.com/api/health
```

## Stream (SSE)
```sh
./restless stream --url https://example.com/sse
```

## Doctor
```sh
./restless doctor
```
